mapper.select: select * from workproject where workprojectID = #{workprojectid,jdbcType=INTEGER} or workprojectName = #{workprojectname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into workproject (workProjectID, workProjectName, workProjectParts, unitName, workProjectRemarks) values (#{workprojectid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workprojectname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workprojectparts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workprojectremarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into workproject
workProjectID,
workProjectName,
workProjectParts,
unitName,
workProjectRemarks,
